note.p: Scottish labourer. Stone carter in Galashiels. Lived in Melrose, Roxburghshire, 1841, 1851; in Ladhope, Galashiels, 1861.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Melrose 799/12/11), 1851 (Melrose 11/23), 161 (Ladhope 1/16)
Correspondence vol. 2, letter from William Kemp, 4 December 1843
Scotland old parish registers births 794/ 10 62 Kirkton (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 21 July 2022)
Scotland statutory deaths 799/2 65 Ladhope (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 21 July 2022)
